Language.Name: Universal
Language.Description: The Universal Language Is The Language Of Cosmos, Because It Includes EveryThing That Was Ever Created.

0.Name: White
0.Expression: The Good Deeds, Innocence And Justice Of Person Who Lives A Virgin Life
0.Description: Everything Starts With Innocence And Purity, As It Is The Foundation Of All Creation And Potential.

1.Name: Blue
1.Expression: The Ideas And Knowledge Of A Person Who Lives A Life Leaded By Understanding To Make Him-Self WisDom Life.
1.Description: The Thoughts And Ideas Form The Basis Of Knowledge, Enabling Us To Create New Concepts And Understand The World Around Us.

2.Name: Red
2.Expression: The Love And Humanity Of A Person Who Lives A Love Life.
2.Description: The Love And Kindness Are Essential Emotions That Connect Us To Other People And Everything Else In Life.

3.Name: Green
3.Expression: The Rights And Orders Of A Person Who Listens To The Law To Get His Green Flag And Living Good Life.
3.Description: The Achievement Of Justice And Fairness Is Vital For Maintaining Order And Ensuring That Everyone's Rights Are Respected.

4.Name: Black
4.Expression: The Evil Deeds, Temptation And Hate Of A Person Who Lives A Evil Life.
4.Description: The Evil Actions Could Leads To Death And As A Human Race, We Must Learn To Recognise Such Behaviours To Avoid Them.

Direction.Name: Hybrid
Direction.Label: The Universal Language(Hybrid)
Direction.Description: This Section Is A Place Of How Translation Is Working ToWards The Language Design.
Direction.Interpretation: The Proof Of Truth(The Law Of Physics And The Holy Bible).
Direction.UnderStand: Each Life Has One MileStone And Each MileStone Has FlagStone, Each FlagStone Has HillStone And Each HillStone Has StepStone.
Direction.Action: It Is To First Describe The Author And Then Cover The Universal Language To Make Guidance For Others.
Direction.Guidance: Every Single Step Must Be Guided By Truth And Nothing Else.
